document.full_text: bp   struck a key victory in its battle to share the cost of the gulf of mexico oil spill when partner mitsui & co agreed on friday to pay $1.1 billion toward the clean-up bill and possibly billions more in fines.
document.title: bp cuts oil spill burden with $1.1 billion mitsui deal
lines_and_colors: bp   struck a key victory in its battle to share the cost of the gulf of mexico oil spill when partner mitsui & co agreed on friday to pay $1.1 billion toward the clean-up bill and possibly billions more in fines.
